verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H5358>"Avenge<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for the <S%H4084>Midianites.<s%> <S%H310>Afterward<s%> you shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to your <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2502>"Arm<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> from among you for the <S%H6635>war,<s%> that they may go against <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> to execute <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5414>vengeance<s%> on <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>
Of every <S%H4294>tribe<s%> one <S%H505>thousand,<s%> throughout all the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you shall <S%H7971>send<s%> to the <S%H6635>war.<s%>"

So there were <S%H4560>delivered,<s%> out of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> of every <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> for <S%H6635>war.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H505>them,<s%> one thousand of every <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> to the <S%H6635>war,<s%> them and <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> to the <S%H6635>war,<s%> with the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> for the <S%H8643>alarm<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
They <S%H6633>warred<s%> against <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and they <S%H2026>killed<s%> every <S%H2145>male.<s%>

They <S%H2026>killed<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the rest of their <S%H2491>slain:<s%> <S%H189>Evi,<s%> and <S%H7552>Rekem,<s%> and <S%H6698>Zur,<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> and <S%H7254>Reba,<s%> the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian:<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> also the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> they <S%H2026>killed<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took <S%H7617>captive<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> and their little <S%H2945>ones;<s%> and all their <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and all their <S%H4735>flocks,<s%> and all their <S%H2428>goods,<s%> they took for a <S%H962>prey.<s%>
All their <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the places in which they <S%H4186>lived,<s%> and all their <S%H2918>encampments,<s%> they burnt with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
They <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> and all the <S%H4455>prey,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>animal.<s%>

They <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7628>captives,<s%> and the <S%H4455>prey,<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and to the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> which are by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and all the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H7107>angry<s%> with the <S%H6485>officers<s%> of the <S%H2428>army,<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6635>from<s%> the service of the <S%H4421>war.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2421>them,<s%> "Have you saved all the <S%H5347>women<s%> <S%H2421>alive?<s%>

<S%H2007>Behold,<s%> these <S%H1961>caused<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> through the <S%H1697>counsel<s%> of <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> to <S%H4560>commit<s%> <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor,<s%> and so the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was among the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Now therefore <S%H2026>kill<s%> every <S%H2145>male<s%> among the little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and <S%H2026>kill<s%> every <S%H802>woman<s%> who has <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with <S%H2145>him.<s%>
But all <S%H802>the<s%> <S%H2945>girls,<s%> who have not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H2145>man<s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with <S%H2421>him,<s%> keep alive for yourselves.

<S%H2583>"Encamp<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> whoever has <S%H2026>killed<s%> any <S%H5315>person,<s%> and whoever has <S%H5060>touched<s%> any <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H2398>purify<s%> yourselves on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> you and your <S%H7628>captives.<s%>

As to every <S%H899>garment,<s%> and all that is <S%H3627>made<s%> of <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and all <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%>' <S%H3627>hair,<s%> and all things made of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> you shall purify <S%H2398>yourselves.<s%>"

<S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> who <S%H935>went<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> "This is the <S%H2708>statute<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses:<s%>
however the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> the <S%H5178>brass,<s%> the <S%H1270>iron,<s%> the <S%H913>tin,<s%> and the <S%H5777>lead,<s%>

<S%H1697>everything<s%> that may <S%H935>withstand<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> you shall make to go <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and it shall be <S%H2891>clean;<s%> nevertheless it shall be <S%H2398>purified<s%> with the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity:<s%> and all that <S%H935>doesn't<s%> withstand the <S%H784>fire<s%> you shall make to go <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

You shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> your <S%H899>clothes<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and you shall be <S%H2891>clean;<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> you shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5375>"Take<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H4455>prey<s%> that was <S%H7628>taken,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>animal,<s%> <S%H499>you,<s%> and Eleazar the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of the <S%H5712>congregation;<s%>

and <S%H2673>divide<s%> the <S%H4455>prey<s%> into two <S%H2673>parts:<s%> between the men <S%H8610>skilled<s%> in <S%H4421>war,<s%> who went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>battle,<s%> and all the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>

<S%H7311>Levy<s%> a <S%H4371>tribute<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> who went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>battle:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred;<s%> of the <S%H120>persons,<s%> of the <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> of the <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> and of the <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>
<S%H3947>Take<s%> it of their <S%H4276>half,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s wave <S%H8641>offering.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s <S%H4276>half,<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H259>drawn<s%> out of every <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> of the <S%H120>persons,<s%> of the <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> of the <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> and of the <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> of all the <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> who <S%H8104>perform<s%> the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Now the <S%H957>prey,<s%> over and <S%H3499>above<s%> the <S%H4455>booty<s%> which the men <S%H5971>of<s%> <S%H6635>war<s%> <S%H962>took,<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%>
and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> - two <S%H505>thousand<s%> head of <S%H1241>cattle,<s%>
and <S%H8346>sixty<s%> - <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%>

and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5315>persons<s%> in <S%H3605>all,<s%> of the <S%H802>women<s%> who had not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H2145>man<s%> by lying with <S%H4904>him.<s%>

The <S%H4275>half,<s%> which was the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of those who went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war,<s%> was in <S%H4557>number<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6629>sheep:<s%>
and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4371>tribute<s%> of the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> - five.
The <S%H1241>cattle<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand;<s%> of which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4371>tribute<s%> was <S%H7657>Seventy<s%> - two.

The <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred;<s%> of which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4371>tribute<s%> was <S%H8346>sixty<s%> - <S%H259>one.<s%>
The <S%H120>persons<s%> were <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand;<s%> of whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4371>tribute<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5315>persons.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4371>tribute,<s%> which was <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s wave <S%H8641>offering,<s%> to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s <S%H4276>half,<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2673>divided<s%> off from the <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H6633>warred<s%>

(now the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>'s <S%H4275>half<s%> was <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%>
and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> head of <S%H1241>cattle,<s%>
and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%>
and <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5315>persons<s%>),

even of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s <S%H4276>half,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H270>drawn<s%> out of every <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>animal,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> who <S%H4931>performed<s%> the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

The <S%H6485>officers<s%> who were over the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of the <S%H6635>army,<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> came <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses;<s%>

and they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H5375>taken<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> who are under our <S%H3027>command,<s%> and there <S%H6485>lacks<s%> not one man of <S%H376>us.<s%>

We have <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H7133>offering,<s%> what every <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H4672>gotten,<s%> of <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H685>armlets,<s%> and <S%H6781>bracelets,<s%> signet <S%H2885>rings,<s%> <S%H5694>earrings,<s%> and <S%H3558>necklaces,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for our <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H2091>gold,<s%> even all <S%H4639>worked<s%> <S%H3627>jewels.<s%>

All the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of the wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> that they offered <S%H7311>up<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> of the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and of the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> was <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>
(The <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> had taken <S%H962>booty,<s%> every man for <S%H582>himself.<s%>)

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it into the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
